data.name: A_Achievements
data.value: Achievements are milestones (e.g., "Reach Level 10", "Lift 1000kg total"). Unlocking achievements grants you special Titles that appear next to your name in the Leaderboard.

data.name: A_CasesInventory_Intro
data.value: As you level up, you can earn or buy Cases. Opening a case (via the Roulette minigame) grants you cosmetic items:

data.name: A_CasesInventory_Item1
data.value: Avatars: Custom profile pictures.

data.name: A_CasesInventory_Item2
data.value: Frames: Borders around your avatar.

data.name: A_CasesInventory_Item3
data.value: Backgrounds: Custom themes for your profile page.

data.name: A_CasesInventory_Outro
data.value: You can equip these items in your Profile.

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Intro
data.value: It's simple:

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Step1
data.value: Go to the Workouts Feed or Home Dashboard.

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Step2
data.value: Click the big orange "Create Workout" button.

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Step3
data.value: Add a name (e.g., "Leg Day") and description.

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Step4
data.value: Add exercises from our library, specifying sets, reps, and weight.

data.name: A_CreateWorkout_Step5
data.value: Save it, and you'll instantly earn XP!

data.name: A_EarnXP
data.value: XP (Experience Points) are calculated based on the volume of your workout. The more weight you lift and the more reps you do, the more XP you gain. Consistency also matters!

data.name: A_EditWorkout
data.value: Currently, workouts are recorded as history logs. While you cannot edit a past log to "cheat" your stats, you can delete accidental entries.

data.name: A_IsItFree
data.value: Yes! The core functionality of tracking workouts and leveling up is completely free. You can earn in-game currency by working out to unlock cosmetic items for your profile.

data.name: A_WhatIsGymify
data.value: Gymify is a gamified fitness tracker designed to make your workouts addictive. We combine traditional tracking (sets, reps, weight) with RPG elements like XP, Levels, and Loot Boxes to keep you motivated.
